history.content:
Hello!

I am a Berkeley 2019 alumni (now a product designer at Google) looking for someone to team up with to develop a booking app for Shopify! (Shopify is an eCommerce platform that has grown exponentially over the past year, which features an app store for 3P developers to create apps for businesses.)


When I was migrating a class-based business's website to Shopify, I found that none of the existing apps to allow customers to book appointments actually met a real business's logistical needs. When I installed and tried each app, I found that their solutions were dismally inadequate. I even emailed their customer supports and they said that the features I need are unsupported and suggested "hacks" to make their product work. However, many businesses are still paying a subscription of $19-129 per month (!!) to use these booking apps despite their functional ineffectiveness and lack of user-centered design. This problem also prevents many class/appointment-based businesses from trying to use Shopify at all. There is a huge opportunity here to create a well designed product to meet this need for both customers and businesses.


I have designed the user-facing app already and have done research of the existing landscape. I am looking for someone who is comfortable with Node and React, and wants to be a partner / teammate in creating this app! I also want you to be excited by the opportunity and have fun! This is a great real world side project, product design portfolio piece, product management, and will make passive income with paying users!

Reply here or contact me at takarasatone@gmail.com to learn more. Thanks!!
history.subject: Seeking React & Node.js Dev for a paid app on Shopify!
